column1: Magistrate  Court  has  been  refused  to  accept  by  the  learned  Magistrate.

column2: Thereafter he  filed  an application for  a mandate  in the nature of a writ of

column1: mandamus  in  the  Provincial  High  Court  of Eastern  Province  holden  at
Kamunai  against the learned Magistrate of Samanthurai to  compel him to
accept  the  private  plaint.  The  learned  High  Court  Judge  refused  notice
and  dismissed  the  application.  Being  aggrieved  by  the  said  order,
